attributes.action: Increase the pay of school support staff such as Teaching Assistants & Lab Assistants
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: School support staff are paid very low wages. Most of them are women, many are well-qualified but have children or other caring responsibilities, and need the school hours and holidays, so they can combine work and caring. Pay levels need to be increased to a decent living wage, and reflecting their responsibilities.
